CustomField.formula: If( Scorecard_Performance__c <=2.49 ,'Needs Improvement', If(Scorecard_Performance__c >2.49 && Scorecard_Performance__c <=3.50,'Meets Expectations', If(Scorecard_Performance__c>3.50 && Scorecard_Performance__c <=5.00,'Exceeds Expectations', null )))
CustomField.label: Rating - Scorecard Performance
